title: tsqlrefine config
description: Configuration file for tsqlrefine T-SQL linter and formatter

compatLevel.description: SQL Server compatibility level. Determines which T-SQL parser version to use. Values: 100 (SQL Server 2008), 110 (SQL Server 2012), 120 (SQL Server 2014), 150 (SQL Server 2019), 160 (SQL Server 2022). Default: 150

ruleset.description: Path to a ruleset JSON file. Can be relative to the config file location or absolute. Use preset rulesets: 'rulesets/recommended.json', 'rulesets/strict.json', or 'rulesets/security-only.json'

plugins.description: List of external plugin DLLs to load for custom rules. Each plugin must implement IRuleProvider interface from TsqlRefine.PluginSdk

path.description: Path to the plugin DLL file. Can be relative to the config file location or absolute

enabled.description: Whether to load and execute this plugin. Default: true

formatting.description: Formatting options for the SQL formatter

indentSize.description: Number of spaces per indent level (for spaces) or tab width (for tabs). Default: 4

maxLineLength.description: Maximum line length (0 = no limit). Default: 0

insertFinalNewline.description: Insert final newline at end of file. Default: true

trimTrailingWhitespace.description: Trim trailing whitespace on lines. Default: true
